author: Brian Schwartz
title: Biden campaign rallies donors for big Super Tuesday push as poll numbers and fundraising soften
description: Attendees described the senior campaign officials' remarks as a "rah rah speech" – and a call to beef up fundraising efforts in order to pick up delegates in earlier primary states such as Nevada and South Carolina.
content: Joe Biden's campaign  which is grappling with weakening poll numbers, a disappointing third quarter fundraising haul and attacks from President Donald Trump over Ukraine ties rallied its leading donors and fundraisers over the weekend in Philadelphia as it lo… [+5741 chars]
